body.name: Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster, Hard Water Stain Remover, Multi-Use Citric Acid Cleaner (24 oz Container, 1 Bottle)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: U.S. EPA Safer Choice certified products contain safer ingredients for human health and the environment.

features: 100% GUARANTEED HARD WATER CLEANER: So long hard water spots! Our powerful booster solution is here to save your favorite glassware and dishes. Just add to your dishwasher load and watch those hard water spots, film, and other mineral deposits like calcium, lime, and iron disappear!

BOOSTED BY CITRIC ACID: Looking for a mighty, yet eco-friendly dishwashing solution? We got you! Thanks to our best friend citric acid, this booster is one of the toughest around to get rid of all the stains and spots on your dishes, leaving a sparkly clean finish. You're welcome!

POWERFUL FORMULAS, SAFER PRODUCTS: Clean your dishes with confidence! We’ve figured out how to power up better household supplies for dishwashing without compromising on safety. This plant-based detergent booster is completely free of dyes, phosphates, and bleach.

UNSTOPPABLE DISHWASHER DUO: Dirty dishes don’t stand a chance with Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster! Pair it with Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Pods to give all your dishes a deep clean and wipe away even the hardest stains and stuck-on food.

PROUD EPA SAFER CHOICE PARTNER: We’re proud to be named a Safer Choice Partner by The United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA). At Lemi Shine, it’s not just about a spotless home for household cleaning products—it’s about keeping you, your family, and the planet safe. We got your back!
body.description: Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster - 24 Ounces Lemi Shine’s Dish Detergent Booster is the top selling dish detergent booster, known best for removing the toughest hard water spots and film.More often than not, hard water is the culprit leaving tough spots and film on your dishes. Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster is a dish spot remover that fights back against the minerals in hard water (magnesium and calcium) to give you clean dishes. Use with your dish detergent in every load to give your machine a boost and make spots and film disappear. Safe, powerful and effective EPA Safer Choice Certified to be safer for human health and the environment Phosphate-free, chlorine-free, non-toxic, biodegradable, no artificial fillers or dyes Septic system friendly Specially formulated machine cleaning product that eliminates odors from internal components Cleans, deodorizes and optimizes - works on all dishwashers Use on dishwasher safe cookware, dishes, and glassware. Read directions before use Made with powerful citric extracts

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Removes hard water spots and film Even moderately hard water can leave spots, streaks, and film on your dishes and glassware. Every time you run a load of dishes, more hard water enters your machine. Use Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster powder with your detergent in every load to ensure that your dishwasher, dishes, and glassware remain shiny and sparkling every time. Fights calcium and magnesium in water to leave dishes sparkling Cleans and optimizes machine performance Deodorizes and freshens dishwasher Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster - 24 Ounces Lemi Shine’s Dish Detergent Booster is the top selling dish detergent booster, known best for removing the toughest hard water spots and film.More often than not, hard water is the culprit leaving tough spots and film on your dishes. Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster is a dish spot remover that fights back against the minerals in hard water (magnesium and calcium) to give you clean dishes. Use with your dish detergent in every load to give your machine a boost and make spots and film disappear. Safe, powerful and effective EPA Safer Choice Certified to be safer for human health and the environment Phosphate-free, chlorine-free, non-toxic, biodegradable, no artificial fillers or dyes Septic system friendly Specially formulated machine cleaning product that eliminates odors from internal components Cleans, deodorizes and optimizes - works on all dishwashers Use on dishwasher safe cookware, dishes, and glassware. Read directions before use Made with powerful citric extracts

Safe for your Home and Family Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster is Safer Choice certified, meaning it's safer for both human health and the environment. It leaves your glasses super shiny and rids your dish cycle of calcium, lime, and rust while protecting your family from the harmful chemicals often found in kitchen and household cleaners. Rid your machine of calcium, lime and rust and restore your dishes to their beautiful shine just like when you first unpacked them!Lemi Shine is safe for pets and kids because it's made with powerful citric extracts, which are naturally occurring substances. It'll leave your dishes so spotless you can actually eat off them!No more hand scrubbing plates, bowls, glasses, and other cookware to get hard water spots and film off. Just use Lemi Shine Dish Detergent Booster in every load for spotless results.

Other Products If you haven't already, check out all of our other great products on Amazon to see how you can get cleaner, safer dishes and appliances. Safer Ingredients We formulate our products based on the precautionary principle: if an ingredient isn't safe, we don't go near it. Instead, we go to great lengths to find ingredients that are safer and get the job done better. Made in the USA Lemi Shine is family owned and our quality products are proudly made in the USA. If you ever have a question about any Lemi Shine product, or cleaning in general, or just want to chat about the latest local gossip, we’re here to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It eliminates hard water stains
reviews.reviewText: Great stuff, just hard to find !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product for the dishwasher!
reviews.reviewText: We are on well water which can be difficult to keep pipes running clean into dishwasher. This product works great. Nice fresh smell when added. Clean, clear dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have hard water but this really cleans and puts a nice shine on the glasses

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Citic Acid works with hard water.
reviews.reviewText: I have hard water and the dishes in my dishwasher were not coming clean and the silverware having soap stains. Rinse aid products are not enough and my water is hot. I used this product years ago and my local grocery stores were not carrying it any longer. I googled articles on citric acid and I knew this is what I needed. ( Was really thinking I needed a new dishwasher ). My dishes come out sparkling clean with Lemi Shine Booster and I'm happy I don't have to buy a new dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does as specified
reviews.reviewText: I have only used it once, but so far so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best hard water product!
reviews.reviewText: Works just like it says! I use it in my dishwasher and in the sink to wash dishes, no more hard water white spots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Addition to a Dishwaher's Cycle!
reviews.reviewText: I discovered this product a few years ago and use it regularly now. The price here is much cheaper than my local grocery store. (Normally I try to buy local, but they have been out of it for months.)It does seem to help clean the dishes, but mostly I like it because it keeps the stainless steel liner really clean in our very hard water! Even the rack rollers work smoother.

We are up in cottage country where well water is extremely hard. So much so that our glasses and plates started to fog up and slightly yellow. Put them in the dishwasher last night and was blown away! Cleared up the foggy colour on my crystal and dishes were super white.
Mezclando con un poco de salvo verde y una cucharada de lemi quedan relucientes... como de fábrica. Se usó en un limpiador con media de inoxidable en agua
It makes my brass preparation easier.

I use this in dishwasher. I have very hard well water with a lot of minerals etc . It does quite well at keeping glasses clear & silverware shiny . It hasn’t taken finish off plates either . The only real negative is that it’s quite expensive. Overall I like the product.

reviews.reviewTitle: le seul produit qui marche chez moi pour enlever les taches blanches
reviews.reviewText: juste dommage qu'il soit trop cher sur amazon, parce que ça fonctionne vraiment bien! je mets 4 étoiles à cause du prix, la qualité c'Est 5/5
